content.eamr: ( ing-3 "1 (15.5 ounce) can chili beans, undrained" )
( ing-4 "1 (14.5 ounce) can diced tomatoes, undrained" )

content.text: 0) In a saucepan, cook beef, onion and garlic over medium heat until meat is no longer pink; drain.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "cook"@18:22 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "beef"@23:27 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "onion"@29:34 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "garlic"@39:45 / FOOD )
		:heat ( temp-0-0 "medium heat"@51:62 / TEMPERATURE )
		:until ( cond-0-0 "until meat is no longer pink"@63:91 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:loc ( tool-0-0 "a saucepan"@6:16 / TOOL )
	)
	:inform ( ac-0-1 "drain"@93:98 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Stir in the remaining ingredients; bring to a boil.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "Stir in"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( "the remaining ingredients"@11:36 / FOOD
			:ref ( ing-3 )
			:ref ( ing-4 )
			:ref ( ing-5 )
			:ref ( ing-6 )
		)
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-1-1 "boil"@49:53 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 2) Reduce heat; cover and simmer for 10-15 minutes or until heated through.
